Summary Note:
Verhoeven Teunissen Meijer and the RM are childhood friends, having attended the same schools and shared many life experiences. Their enduring friendship has laid a solid foundation for their business relationship.
Verhoeven Teunissen Meijer is a seasoned professional with over 30 years of experience.
Julius Baer's personalized approach and dedication to client success were key factors in his decision to join.
Family Background: Verhoeven Teunissen Meijer is married to Astrid. Together they have 3 kids called Charlotte, Brinkman and Eva.
Education Background:
Verhoeven earned his secondary school diploma from Westfriesgymnasium Hoorn in 1988.
Verhoeven graduated from Utrecht University in 1995, completing his higher education.
Occupation History:
Verhoeven Teunissen Meijer is a 54 year old Private Equity Investor from Netherlands.
Verhoeven Teunissen Meijer began his professional journey as a Investment Banker at ING Group N.V. in 1995, laying the foundation for future success.
His subsequent role was as a Private Equity Investor at SNS Bank N.V., where he continued to grow professionally from 1998 to 2024.
Wealth Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 540000 EUR.
He has condo located in Tilburg, worth 1450000 EUR.

He inherited 2400000 EUR from his grandmother, a well-known Venture Capitalist, in 2005, allowing him to expand his investment portfolio.
Client Summary: In conclusion, we are confident in the client's financial stability and future prospects.
